documentation.description: Retrieves information for API keys using a subset of query DSL

with_limited_by.description: flag to show the limited-by role descriptors of API Keys

with_profile_uid.description: flag to also retrieve the API Key's owner profile uid, if it exists

typed_keys.description: flag to prefix aggregation names by their respective types in the response

body.description: From, size, query, sort and search_after
